name: Treasa Aman
text: Great food and a friendly staff.  The pizza is great - nice, crispy crust.  We love going here for lunch as its pretty close to the office and they are always quick to serve.  Give 'em a try - it's worth it!

name: Alline Maxfield
text: The service was awesome. Our waitress was polite and prompt and the pizza was one of the best we had in years. We both started recommending this place to our friends.

name: Tyler Estes
text: DO NOT USE THEIR APP!!!! Dominoes is way better. Pizza Hut App sucks. I decided to try Pizza Hut again after several years and even though I selected and checked my order I received a pizza with the wrong toppings. I called the store and …More

name: Elizabeth Fox
text: Stopped in for the buffet. We arrived as it was being set out. Everything was a good temperature. The variety of pizza was great. The pasta was fresh and not dried out. The salad side was a little disappointing. The dessert pies were …More

name: Georgia Ayres
text: Pizza Hut has good pizzas as far as I am concerned.

name: Emily S. McElyea
text: Great pizza every single time.

name: Thomas Ott
text: I switched to the Anthem Pizza Hut after trying another national pizza chain in Anthem. The other pizza chain got my pizza orders wrong 60% of time. …More

name: merle mccallister
text: Friendly and professional. The pretzel crust is awesome. I got two medium supremes for $6.99 each and were amazing. The guy who took my order was super friendly. Thanks!

name: Llew Salaun
text: Always get my online orders correct so u don't demand a lot.

name: Peggy Florka
text: They closed their sit down restaurant,  moved east into a strip mall and only offer carry out now.  That's not pizza hut, that's pizza to go.  Very disappointed as I drove 20 minutes for a nice sit down dinner.  We ended up not even …More

name: Jessica Harris
text: Best flavors of crust!  As long as you get deep dish (thicker crust but not crazy thick)  it's am easy five star!!

name: buddha man
text: Good deals.. cheesey crust a must!

name: Ty Hample
text: The boneless wings were a joke. If you're not going to take pride in food you sell, then don't sell it. Disappointing.

name: Brook Ma
text: Good pizza! You never can go wrong with Pizza Hut.

name: terry tyree
text: Pizza is hit and miss. Just ordered a buffalo chicken pizza and it has no buffalo sauce on it

name: Thomas Bolin
text: Always get great pizza and bread sticks!! And friendly staff!!

name: Celsa Stiffler
text: The service was awesome. Our waitress was polite and prompt and the pizza was one of the best we had in years. We both started recommending this place to our friends.

name: Susan W
text: Usual pizza place customer service OK pizza good needs more excitement

name: david Nealon
text: Excellent service, great experience and excellent Customer Service from John. He took the time to chat and listen to me and my fear of Eagle Trail. Thank you John!!

name: Ed Merritt
text: Pizza was good but being from NY it's hard to compare.

name: K Ezzell
text: We ordered the big box deal and got a pepperoni and a cheese pizza delivered.  out of 9 people in my house 7 of them became violently ill within 20-30  minutes of eating the pizza.  One adult did not eat and our 2 year old only had …More

name: Michelle madonia
text: Just what I needed lol

name: Matt Dalton
text: An average Pizza Hut. Going for the lunch buffet is well worth it, as you can get a buttload of different pizzas, including desert pizzas, for a good price.

name: Kenny Nielson
text: It's Pizza Hut they have my pizza done in 10 minutes while I walk the dog got a pan pizza for 10 bucks large not a bad deal took it  home to lunch for me and my parents ...

name: Scott Peddle
text: Pizza was cold when it was arrived and it looked like it was tossed around in the box. Poor service and it took 1.5 hours to arrive, I would order from Barro's Pizza and avoid this place.
